description:
Whether you’re trying to prepare for upcoming storms or just get ready for a long road trip, a big battery pack can really make your life a lot better. Right now, Amazon has a limited-stock deal on the Jackery Portable Power Station Explorer 500 for just $299. That’s way down from its regular $499 price […]

The post Get a Jackery solar generator for its cheapest price ever during Amazon’s flash sale appeared first on Popular Science.
title: Get a Jackery solar generator for its cheapest price ever during Amazon’s flash sale

description:
Generative AI is filling up the web at a rapid rate, and while we’re weighing up the consequences for education, energy, and human creativity, it’s making it much harder to trust anything that appears online. Is it real, or is it AI-generated? For the moment, we don’t have a 100 percent reliable way of detecting […]

The post How to spot an AI-generated video appeared first on Popular Science.
title: How to spot an AI-generated video
